note: Real good-lookin rural antifascist rosé grower posting from scenic Dreadful Acres in the Texas Hill Country. Blurry iPhone nature photos my specialty. Retired writer, home chef AF, TV watcher, horse-haver, goat herder, dog lover & appreciator of wild entities. Due to user error, I also have a Pomeranian. 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🇺🇦 ✊✊🏼✊🏾
